channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rework to road surface is worse than before!!, 12th September
item.description:
As of 11/09/2025 the rework done to this stretch of road is now worse than the dip itself was! Driving at 45mph could have caused serious damage to my car. Today I approached at 30mph and it’s just as dangerous! The tarmac hasn’t been smoothed to a level surface so it’s like driving over several ramps! If my cars suspension goes, I will send you the bill. Please sort this out properly once and for all!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This pothole was filled twice last winter and has reopened. It is sufficiently deep that cars are being forced in to the opposite lane to steer round it., 12th September
item.description:
If you are travelling south towards Withington it is on the left hand side of the road before the turning on your right to Kim Bailey.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Still failure to put up any signage since removing 40mph signs. No 30s have been put up to alert users of new speeds. However a bloody hedge hog sign has appeared. What’s more important the safety of our children crossing the roads or hedgehogs, 12th September
item.description:
